Title: Sit With Us App: How Kids are Fighting Bullying One LunchTable at a Time (e252)
Description:
Natalie Hampton, a senior in Los Angeles, was bullied and ate alone every day. After she transferred schools, she found teachers and other students who wanted to make sure no one ate alone. Her “Sit with Us” app and clubs are sweeping the US and other countries as kids use social media to find other kids and stand against bullying.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e252
